class_notes: GH students only until Nov 23 and then all others may register.
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530. Offers an epidemiological, clinical and public health perspective of selected acute infectious diseases of current national and international interest. Emphasizes the agent, methods of transmission, the host, role of surveillance, and methods of control and prevention.
sections: Class Nbr: 4615, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 8-9:50a, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
